message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm open to discussing further.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort to reach a compromise. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
